title: Burner Pages
description: Web design made simple. Allows users to create their own one page website that can be shared with anyone. Technologies used: Mongo, Express, React Js, Node Js, Google User Authentication, Materialize, Giphy API

title: FantasyGM
description: A fantasy basketball app that allows user to build their custom teams featuring every player who ever played. Features play-by-play simulations. Technologies used: JQuery, Google Firebase, MySQL, Sport Radar API

title: Meal Planner
description: A site where users can search and save recipes and graph nutritional information for meal planning. Technologies used: JQuery, Google Firebase, Edemam Recipe API
